SENTRY API

Welcome to the AXI Sentry API.

The Sentry API is a system which monitors information gathered by Commanders in Elite: Dangerous using the Elite: Dangerous Data Network.

API Endpoints

  • http://sentry.antixenoinitiative.com/systems
  • http://sentry.antixenoinitiative.com/incursions
  • http://sentry.antixenoinitiative.com/incursionshistory
  • http://sentry.antixenoinitiative.com/presence
